item.description: Ordering Tasks ç®€åŒ–äº†æ‹“æ‰‘æ’åºï¼Œåªå› æ ¹æ®é¢˜ä¸­çš„æ„æ€äº†è§£åˆ°ä¸€å®šæ˜¯DAG #include <bits/stdc++.h> using namespace std; const int M = 110; int m, n, vis[M]; bool g[M][M]; vector<int> ans; void dfs(int u) { vis[u] = true; for (int i = 1; i <= m; i++) { if (!vis[i] && g[u][i]) { dfs(i); } } ans.push_back(u); } int main() { #ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE freopen("test.in", "r", stdin); freopen("test.out", "w", stdout); #endif while (scanf("%d%d", &m, &n), m + n) { int x, y; for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) { scanf("%d%d", &x, &y); g[x][y] = true; } for (int i = 1; i <= m; i++) { if (vis[i]) continue; dfs(i); } reverse(ans.
